metadata.title: USN-4929-1 -- Bind vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Greg Kuechle discovered that Bind incorrectly handled certain incremental zone updates. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2021-25214)  Siva Kakarla discovered that Bind incorrectly handled certain DNAME records. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2021-25215)  It was discovered that Bind incorrectly handled GSSAPI security policy negotiation. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2021-25216)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4929-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libdns-export1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libdns-export1100-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libdns1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisc169 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libbind-dev - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisc-export169-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisccc-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisccfg-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 bind9-host - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libirs-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisccc160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisc-export169 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisccfg160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 bind9-doc - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libbind-export-dev - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisccc-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libirs-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libisccfg-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 dnsutils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 bind9 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 bind9utils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libbind9-160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 libirs160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 liblwres160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.15 No subscription required
